games.name: Slope
games.description: Slope is a fun endless running game created by RobKayS. Guide a rolling ball down a steep, neon-lit slope while avoiding obstacles and staying on the platform. Be careful – if you hit a red block or fall off the edge, it's game over!
games.controls: Arrow Keys or A/D - Steer left and right
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to make small adjustments rather than sharp turns to maintain control.
Use anticipation skills to look ahead and plan your path before obstacles appear!
games.creator: Slope is created by RobKayS, known for developing addictive skill-based arcade games with minimalist design.

games.name: Run 3
games.description: Run 3 is a fun endless runner game created by Player 03. Navigate through space tunnels by running and jumping while gravity shifts around you. Be careful – if you fall into the void or hit obstacles, you'll have to restart!
games.controls:
Arrow Keys or WASD - Move and jump
Space - Jump
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to use the walls and ceiling as the floor when gravity shifts.
Use the different characters you've unlocked – each has unique abilities that help in specific tunnel types!
games.creator: Run 3 is created by Player 03, known for developing the popular Run series with innovative gravity-based mechanics.

games.name: Super Mario Flash
games.description: Super Mario Flash is a fun platformer game created by Pouetpu. Play through classic Mario-style levels or create your own using the built-in level editor. Be careful – if you fall into pits or get hit by enemies too many times, you'll lose a life!
games.controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
Shift or A - Jump
Ctrl or S - Run/Shoot fireballs
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to explore levels thoroughly for hidden power-ups and secret areas.
Use the level editor to create and share your own custom Mario challenges!
games.creator: Super Mario Flash is created by Pouetpu, a fan developer who created this beloved Flash tribute to Nintendo's Super Mario series.

games.name: Retro Bowl
games.description: Retro Bowl is a fun American football game created by New Star Games. Manage your team and lead them to championship glory with strategic plays and precise throws. Be careful – if you make too many incomplete passes or bad decisions, you'll lose the game!
games.controls:
Mouse - Aim and throw passes
Click - Select plays and make decisions
WASD - Control player movement
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to invest in your offense early – a strong receiving corps wins games.
Use the play-calling strategy you've learned to read defenses and exploit mismatches!
games.creator: Retro Bowl is created by New Star Games, known for developing engaging sports management games with retro aesthetics.

games.name: Bloons Tower Defense 4
games.description: Bloons Tower Defense 4 is a fun tower defense game created by Ninja Kiwi. Strategically place monkey towers along the path to pop waves of colorful bloons before they escape. Be careful – if too many bloons get through, you'll lose lives and fail the level!
games.controls:
Mouse - Select and place towers
Click - Upgrade towers and activate abilities
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to save money for crucial upgrades rather than placing too many weak towers.
Use tower combinations to handle different bloon types effectively, especially tough MOAB-class bloons!
games.creator: Bloons Tower Defense 4 is created by Ninja Kiwi, a New Zealand-based game developer famous for the beloved Bloons franchise.

games.name: 1v1.LOL
games.description: 1v1.lol is a fun building and shooting game created by JustPlay.LOL. Battle opponents in fast-paced 1v1 matches where you can build structures and eliminate enemies. Be careful – if your opponent builds faster or shoots more accurately, you'll be eliminated!
games.controls:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Aim
Q/C/V/B - Build structures
Space - Jump
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to practice building muscle memory in the training mode first.
Use the high ground advantage gained through building to get better shooting angles on opponents!
games.creator: 1v1.lol is created by JustPlay.LOL, known for developing competitive multiplayer games with building mechanics.

games.name: Snake
games.description: Snake is a fun classic arcade game. Control a growing snake and eat food to increase your length while avoiding walls and your own tail. Be careful – if you crash into yourself or the boundaries, it's game over!
games.controls: Arrow Keys or WASD - Change direction
games.instructions:
Don't be afraid to follow the edges of the screen to create more space in the center.
Use a spiral pattern to safely navigate as your snake grows longer!
games.creator: Snake is a classic game concept originally created by Gremlin Industries, reimagined in countless versions across gaming history.
